my.particlesim

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • my.particlesim.Particle

  • public class Particle
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Particle(int mass, int charge, int x, int y)
      Creates a new particle with a given mass and charge at the location (x, y).
      Particle(int mass, int charge, java.awt.Point p)
      Creates a new particle with a given mass and charge at Point p.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Applies a displacement to the particle

      Draws this particle to a canvas

      Returns the charge of the particle.
      int getMass()
      Returns the mass of this particle
      int getSize()
      Returns the diameter of the particle
      void move(int width, int height)
      Updates the position of the particle if this was done in the update method physics would be calculated incorrectly and Third Law force pairs would not be equal
      void setId(int id)
      Sets the id of the particle
      void update(java.util.ArrayList<Particle> others, int dt, int width, int height, boolean gravity, boolean electro, boolean collision)
      Calculates physics for the particle modifies vx and vy based on electrostatic attraction, gravity and collisions

      • Particle

        public Particle(int mass,
                int charge,
                int x,
                int y)
        Creates a new particle with a given mass and charge at the location (x, y).
        Parameters:
        mass - The mass of the particle
        charge - The charge of the particle
        x - The initial x location of the particle
        y - The initial y location of the particle

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(java.util.ArrayList<Particle> others,
                   int dt,
                   int width,
                   int height,
                   boolean gravity,
                   boolean electro,
                   boolean collision)
        Calculates physics for the particle modifies vx and vy based on electrostatic attraction, gravity and collisions
        Parameters:
        others - The other particles on the canvas
        dt - The physics delta t
        width - The current width of the world
        height - The current height of the world
        gravity - Sets whether or not to simulate gravity
        electro - Sets whether or not to simulate electrostatic forces
        collision - Sets whether or not particles collide

        public void collide(Particle other,
                    double d)

      • move

        public void move(int width,
                 int height)
        Updates the position of the particle if this was done in the update method physics would be calculated incorrectly and Third Law force pairs would not be equal
        Parameters:
        width - the current width of the world
        height - the current height of the world
